alert.note: Alert for Donley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 09 at 11:12PM CDT until June 09 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WHEELER...COLLINGSWORTH AND SOUTHEASTERN DONLEY COUNTIES... At 1112 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Lutie to 6 miles northwest of Wellington to 7 miles northeast of Memphis, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Shamrock, Hedley, Dodson, Lutie, Dozier, Lela, Samnorwood and Quail. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
